text: Hawai‘i’s native bird & bee populations are in danger due to shrinking habitats, disease-carrying mosquitoes, & expanding predator populations. This new federal funding will combat these dangers and help protect & save native species and their habitats. https://t.co/hOsDm14FHy

This move will unfreeze supply chains and allow U.S. companies to start building solar projects again. Glad to see @POTUS taking action to save thousands of jobs and keep us on track to meet our clean energy goals. https://t.co/OyX28GRCFq

As we continue fighting for civil rights and representation, I’m committed to passing the Equality Act to end LGBTQ+ discrimination so that everyone can be who they are and love who they love. Happy #Pride!

June is #PrideMonth – a time to celebrate our LGBTQ+ community. It’s also an opportunity to reflect on the progress we have made and the trailblazers who dedicated their lives to helping us reach this point. https://t.co/AQMvQ7OTdv

That’s why we brought the Senate Committee on Indian Affairs to Hilo and Honolulu for field hearings last week. We were able to meet and talk with local leaders about how the federal government can continue to help on issues like housing, education, and health.

The federal government has a trust responsibility to act in the interest of Native Hawaiians. In order to meet that, we need to hear directly from the Native Hawaiian community. https://t.co/CVlfkKIU3B

Today I’m chairing a Senate Indian Affairs Committee field hearing here in Hilo. We’ll be hearing from Native Hawaiian leaders on how the federal government can continue to help and provide more resources. WATCH our live field hearing: https://t.co/4kON4X1jMR
Mahalo to all the Native Hawaiian leaders who joined our Senate Indian Affairs Committee hearing today in Honolulu. https://t.co/aLXEQIQMFY

We brought the Senate Committee on Indian Affairs to Hawai‘i to hear directly from the Native Hawaiian community on how the federal government can continue to help and provide more resources. WATCH our live field hearing in Honolulu:  https://t.co/cONbQeosgU
